title: Riot Can you help me？
body:
I bought  LOL 15,000 Riot Points Card in offgamers . but when I tried to redeem the other it informed me it was already redeemed. 
They said
“”As checked with support, the code has already been redeemed on 1st December 2016. 

Kindly be informed that we will not be able to provide further information on redemption details as LOL support has strict policy to protect the privacy of their users.''

But my account is still 4rp， I would like to know which account has been used the code。

replies.body: This site is beyond what's supported per our[ prepaid card guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753224-Prepaid-RP-Cards-NA-OCE-), so I don't really know the legitimacy of the content you're purchasing.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our billing team can look into your issue individually.  We will reply back asap!
